The program of exchanging old clothes for trees

With any five items of clothing,
participants will be able to choose a pot of succulents,

more positive messages according to the organizers.  Collected clothes

given free to people in
difficult circumstances.  towels collect clothes

newer owners.
Clothing recycling and exchange activities like this not
only help tidy up the wardrobe but also contribute to
protecting the environment for a green planet.

Survival on an island attracts tens of

but very few people who play this game
know that one of
their fiercest opponents is actually an 81-
year-old woman living in the area.
Mrs. Maria Elena Arevalo's hometown has
such a soft and gentle voice. But when she sits in the
gaming chair, she suddenly turns into a
ruthless worker who continuously defeats her opponents in the
wrestling game. Mrs. Arevalo is a female
warrior.  Wearing a Kimono, holding a gun and wearing a
fang mask, nicknamed Mami nen C said that at
first she didn't want to hurt anyone,
but once she got into the game, she started fighting. She
got into video games a few years
ago after her husband passed away.  At first I did
n't even know how to use the mouse. Then
I was very excited. We started
playing whenever my nephew could
play with me. Mr. Arevalo practiced three times
a week for two hours at a time and said he
felt  more comfortable when playing games because I
no longer think much about my deceased husband.

from the discovery of criminals residing
